History
=======

0.2.0 (Jun 8, 2014)
---------------------
* Upgrade Reveal.js version to 2.6.2
* Upgrade JQuery version to v1.11.1
* Improved unittest.
* Enrich the document.

0.1.1 (Jan 1, 2014)
---------------------
* add html_theme_options['plugin_list'].
* add tox test.
* Python3 support.

0.1.0 (Aug 25, 2013)
---------------------
* first release
